title: Most of my champs gone
body: I have not played in a while (3-4 months) when i logged back in most of my champs were gone, i had a lot of skins with them too. Is this a glitch? Does riot ban people and take champs ever?

replies.body: Were the champs/skins purchased with rp, or gifts from other people? And were those funds charged back? And you're certain that it's the same account? Other than that, I wouldn't see why anything should disappear, even if you stopped playing for any amount of time. I stopped playing for nearly if not more than a year before, and nothing disappeared.
It's weird. I bet someone refunded it or he just logged onto other account.
It doesn't look like anything has been refunded or removed from this account, but were there any specific skins/champs missing that you remember having?
